name: framewarc
description: A module system and various libraries for portable Arc programming.

scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test
scripts.build-arc-host-dir: rainbow-js-arc init-arc build/test/arc/ && mkdir -p build/test/arc/lib/ && cp -r arc build/test/arc/lib/framewarc
scripts.repl: cd build/test/arc/ && rainbow-js-arc run-compat -e '(= fwarc-dir* "lib/framewarc/")' '(load:+ fwarc-dir* "loadfirst.arc")'
scripts.test: cd build/test/arc/ && rainbow-js-arc run-compat -e '(= fwarc-dir* "lib/framewarc/" fwarc-test-status* 1)' '(do (load:+ fwarc-dir* "loadfirst.arc") (= fwarc-test-status* 0))' '(when (iso 1 fwarc-test-status*) quit.1)' '(each file `(iter-demo jvm-demo module-demo multirule-demo patmac-demo secretarg-demo) (= fwarc-test-status* 1) (loadfromwd:+ fwarc-dir* "examples/" file ".arc") (= fwarc-test-status* 0))' 'quit.fwarc-test-status*'

author: Rocketnia
